verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav; to him בְּהַעֲלֹֽתְךָ֙ <S%H5927><s%> be-ha-'a-lo-te-Cha unto him When thou lightest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנֵּרֹ֔ת <S%H5216><s%> han-ne-Rot, the lamps אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מוּל֙ <S%H4136><s%> mul against פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the front הַמְּנוֹרָ֔ה <S%H4501><s%> ham-me-no-Rah, the candlestick יָאִ֖ירוּ <S%H215><s%> ya-'I-ru shall give light שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At the seven הַנֵּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H5216><s%> han-ne-Rot. lamps

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as did כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> ken so אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, And Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מוּל֙ <S%H4136><s%> mul against פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the front הַמְּנוֹרָ֔ה <S%H4501><s%> ham-me-no-Rah, the candlestick הֶעֱלָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Lah so he lighted נֵרֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H5216><s%> ne-ro-Tei-ha; the lamps כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. Moses

וְזֶ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh now this מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh And this work הַמְּנֹרָה֙ <S%H4501><s%> ham-me-no-Rah of the candlestick מִקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H4749><s%> mik-Shah [was of] beaten זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav, gold עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against יְרֵכָ֥הּ <S%H3409><s%> ye-re-Chah unto the shaft עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- to its פִּרְחָ֖הּ <S%H6525><s%> pir-Chah thereof unto the flowers מִקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H4749><s%> mik-Shah thereof [was] beaten work הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he כַּמַּרְאֶ֗ה <S%H4758><s%> kam-mar-'Eh, according unto the pattern אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֶרְאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> her-'Ah had shewed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah so he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמְּנֹרָֽה׃ <S%H4501><s%> ham-me-no-Rah. the candlestick פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

קַ֚ח <S%H3947><s%> kach Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, the Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְטִהַרְתָּ֖ <S%H2891><s%> ve-ti-har-Ta and cleanse אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

וְכֹֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> ve-choh- Thus תַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh And thus shalt thou do לָהֶם֙ la-Hem לְטַֽהֲרָ֔ם <S%H2891><s%> le-ta-ha-Ram, unto them to cleanse הַזֵּ֥ה <S%H5137><s%> haz-Zeh them Sprinkle עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem over מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> mei water חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat; of purifying וְהֶעֱבִ֤ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> ve-he-'e-Vi-ru use תַ֙עַר֙ <S%H8593><s%> ta-'ar A razor עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- their whole בְּשָׂרָ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Ram, all their flesh וְכִבְּס֥וּ <S%H3526><s%> ve-chib-be-Su and let them wash בִגְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H899><s%> vig-dei-Hem their clothes וְהִטֶּהָֽרוּ׃ <S%H2891><s%> ve-hit-te-Ha-ru. and [so] make themselves clean

וְלָֽקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-ke-Chu Then let them take פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> par bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- afflicted בָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar, bull וּמִנְחָת֔וֹ <S%H4503><s%> u-min-cha-To, with his meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let [even] fine flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-Sha-men; with oil וּפַר־ <S%H6499><s%> u-far- bullock שֵׁנִ֥י <S%H8145><s%> she-Ni and another בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- afflicted בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar bull תִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> tik-Kach shalt thou take לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat. for a sin offering

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-rav-Ta And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, the Levites לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְהִ֨קְהַלְתָּ֔ <S%H6950><s%> ve-Hik-hal-ta, together אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole עֲדַ֖ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat the whole assembly בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֥ <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-rav-Ta And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim the Levites לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God וְסָמְכ֧וּ <S%H5564><s%> ve-sa-me-Chu shall put בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim. upon the Levites

וְהֵנִיף֩ <S%H5130><s%> ve-he-Nif shall offer אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלְוִיִּ֤ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim the Levites תְּנוּפָה֙ <S%H8573><s%> te-nu-Fah [for] an offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְהָי֕וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu may qualify לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> la-'a-Vod that they may execute אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dat the service יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim And the Levites יִסְמְכ֣וּ <S%H5564><s%> yis-me-Chu shall lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem, their hands עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh upon the heads הַפָּרִ֑ים <S%H6499><s%> hap-pa-Rim; of the bullocks וַ֠עֲשֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> Va-'a-seh and thou shalt offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad the one חַטָּ֜את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat [for] a sin offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad and the other עֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah [for] a burnt offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD לְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> le-chap-Per to make an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim. for the Levites

וְהַֽעֲמַדְתָּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> ve-ha-'a-mad-Ta And thou shalt set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, the Levites לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> ve-lif-Nei and before בָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav; his sons וְהֵנַפְתָּ֥ <S%H5130><s%> ve-he-naf-Ta and offer אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> te-nu-Fah them [for] an offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וְהִבְדַּלְתָּ֙ <S%H914><s%> ve-hiv-dal-Ta Thus shalt thou separate אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, the Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-yu become לִ֖י li הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim. and the Levites

וְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-rei- And after כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> chen after that יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u go in הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, that shall the Levites לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> la-'a-Vod to do the service אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְטִֽהַרְתָּ֣ <S%H2891><s%> ve-ti-har-Ta and thou shalt cleanse אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, וְהֵנַפְתָּ֥ <S%H5130><s%> ve-he-naf-Ta them and offer אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam תְּנוּפָֽה׃ <S%H8573><s%> te-nu-Fah. them [for] an offering

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for נְתֻנִ֨ים <S%H5414><s%> ne-tu-Nim For they [are] wholly given נְתֻנִ֥ים <S%H5414><s%> ne-tu-Nim given הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> hem-mah like לִ֔י Li, מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch unto me from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel תַּחַת֩ <S%H8478><s%> ta-Chat instead פִּטְרַ֨ת <S%H6363><s%> pit-Rat instead of such as open כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of every רֶ֜חֶם <S%H7358><s%> Re-chem every womb בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor [even instead of] the firstborn כֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> kol of all מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לָקַ֥חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach-ti have I taken אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam לִֽי׃ Li.

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לִ֤י li כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol every בְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> be-chOr For all the firstborn בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> biv-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ba-'a-Dam [are] mine [both] man וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> u-vab-be-he-Mah; and beast בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom, on the day הַכֹּתִ֤י <S%H5221><s%> hak-ko-Ti that I smote כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all בְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> be-chOr every firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt הִקְדַּ֥שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> hik-Dash-ti I sanctified אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam לִֽי׃ Li.
